Layer constructor

Parameters:
nr_neurons - Number of neurons that the layer will contain

                   IActivationFunction activation_function,

Layer constructor

Parameters:
nr_neurons - Number of neurons that the layer will contain.
nr_bias - The number of bias nodes.

Forwards the values to the next layer

Returns:
Boolean indicating if the operation succeeded

getInput

public java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double> getInput()
Returns the neuron layer's input

Returns:
Returns a vector with all the neuron's inputs, or null in case of error

getNeuron

public Neuron getNeuron(int i)
Returns the specified neuron

Parameters:
i - Index of the neuron
Returns:
Returns the neuron, returns null in case it doesn't exist

getNumberNeurons

public int getNumberNeurons(Neuron.NeuronType neuron_type)
Returns the number of neurons of a certain type

Parameters:
neuron_type - The type of neuron (use constants in class Neuron)
Returns:
The number of neurons of the type specified that this neuron layer contains, or -1 in case of error

getOutput

public java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double> getOutput()
Returns the neuron layer's output

Returns a vector with all the neuron's outputs, or null in case of error
